noTopic.en: ü§î Oh, I don't think we've chosen a topic for training yet! Just write me the name of the topic you are interested in!

hasTopic.en:
üìö You already have a learning topic selected: *{topic}*!

Want to change the topic? Just write the name of a new one, and I'll switch your training to it!

üîÑ Changing topics isn't a failure, it's a knowledge upgrade!

topicLengthError.en: ‚ö†Ô∏è Topic is out of acceptable range. Please enter a topic from 3 to 50 characters.

topicSaved.en: ‚úÖ Great! I've saved your learning topic: "{topic}". Now I'll send you materials on this topic.

userNotFound.en: ‚ùå Error: user not found. Please use the /start command to register.

topicSaveError.en: ‚ùå An error occurred while saving the topic. Please try again.
